Welcome to the Encyclopedia

Welcome to the Static Encyclopedia Reader

This reader provides access to the foundational documents and historical entries of the system. All content is embedded directly in this file - no server required!

Features

  • Enhanced Reading: Use Marker.js to annotate and highlight important passages
  • Smart Search: Search across all documents with instant results
  • Concept Hover: Hover over highlighted concepts for definitions
  • Navigation: Click any internal link to jump to related documents
  • Browser History: Full back/forward support with state preservation
  • No Server Required: Everything is embedded in this single file

Getting Started

Select a document from the navigation menu to begin reading. You can use the search function to quickly find topics of interest across all documents.
